content.detailedDescription: We were riding fence at dusk and saw thirty or more cigar shaped ufo's infesting the skies. we tried to take pictures of them but our cell phone cameras would not work on them. they buzzed us with humming sounds and there were window like lights up and down the sides of them. we were drinking a bit that night but were not that drunk and could still ride a horse. this was the damnest thing we'd ever seen.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo infesting the skys around waller and hockley, texas

content.detailedDescription: my family was outside grilling food on my deck outside my house and i looked up in the air and seen a huge vapor trail cutting across the sky looked like a white rope and in front of it was an invisible aircraft that looked like it was cloaked almost clear and in front of it for maybe a mile or two there was a tear in the sky of dark blue liked that was really where the aircraft was in the sky tore write through the clouds and left a clear path and after me and my family were left in aw of what we seen it and started screaming it was liked it heard us and made a left bank and took of in the distance over the trees i have digital 14mp camera pictures of the event but dont have them in my computer yet to send them and i dont want to forget that maybe 30 seconds after it left the sky turned golden for like a hole minute contact me please thanks kenn
content.summary: The ufo looked liked something out of the predator movies cloaked invisible i have pictures

content.detailedDescription: Was at my sons football game, seated on the home side of our football field facing south, for some reason i noticed this sphere just to the west end of the field to the left of the goal posts hovering in the tree line acorss the road that runs along the stadium to the south (fm 1644).  it was if it was watching the game too.  i know it was there for a good time because i would watch the game for a bit and look back and it would still be there, then some good play would happen and i would go back to watching the game. the next time i looked it was gone.  so it was there for about 10 min. i know others were aware of it but didn't make much to do about it and egnored the object.  this is not my first incouter and was in the air force for a few years and know the capabilities of our aircraft and this was not our aircraft.
content.summary: Sphere was noticed during high school football game hovering just above trees

content.detailedDescription: I went to smoke a ciggrette on my best friends back porch, which i had done thousands of times before. this night i was by myself and i noticed a light that i had never seen before. i thought it could be a new light pole. as i stared at it for about 5 minutes it looked to be pulsating. then it shot straight up into space in the blink of an eye. it was truely amazing. i know that it was something out of this world, i believe it was an angel. i feel very blessed and lucky to have seen this. every night i go to my top deck which is pretty close to the location of where i saw the orb, i have never seen anything like it since. but i am always looking so hopefully i will see something again one day. :)
content.summary: If i would have blinked it would of disappeared, that is how fast the orb shot up into outerspace.

content.detailedDescription: Driving from california to las vegas with family.  about 3:30 pm daylight. i was the front passenger.  looking at the landscape/sky.  i noticed a fibrous looking cloud with seven or eight of vertical trails, also cloudlike, going straight through the could.  looked odd.  to the left of the cloud, which was by itself in the middle of the blue desert sky, was a horizontal trail leading straight into the cloud.  no planes or anything in sight.  as i am looking at this image, i see movement and think it is a plane,but as i looked closer, it was a completely white, barbell shaped ship that appeared and followed the horizontal line directly into this stand alone cloud.  i watched the other side of the cloud to see if it came out, as i thought it looked so strange and i wanted to see it again to verify it was not a plane.  no lights, no tail, just very white and not reflective but with two ball structures on either end of the cyllinder, very large and round -exactly like a dumbell only round on each end.  this whole time the vertical and horizontal trails are still in the cloud.  i then looked back at the left to the horizontal trail and as i am looking at it, another "ship" appears out of nowhere, just materializes right before my eyes from blue sky, as it materialized you could see the shape before it became solid and then white, and it too then followed the same trail, entered the cluod with no egress.  this whole process took about two minutes.  no planes around or arriving after i saw this.  strange.  i still do not believe what i saw and cannot explain it.  felt dumbfounded.  too embarrassed to tell anyone in vehicle what i saw...Everyone was either sleeping-the children-or listening to i pod.
content.summary: White cyllinder with round ends, like barbell, materializes in blue sky and enters only cloud in desert with no egress

content.detailedDescription:
Bright white star-like cylinder that has been hovering over simi valley 
nightly since 9-01-11.
on first night of sighting i seen it turn off to view the structure,and it was a cylinder shaped object that was red-hot in color,last night it was
viewed dropping in elevation coming very low to ground. 
my estimation is 300 feet from ground.
this object is viewed nightly hovering over simi valley and i have witnessed it de-sending and elivating rapidly when helicopter is in vicinity.
99% sure it can be viewed tonight. from dusk to dawn.
content.summary: Bright white starlight object hovering above simi valley nightly.

content.detailedDescription: It was late wednesday night/early thursday mourning.  i would estimate the time around 3:30.  i was taking my new puppy, out to go potty, when sighting occurred. it took me roughly a minute or so before my dog barked, because she sighted the object.  in the back woods, of a state park, behind my house, is where the object was sighted.  it appeared to be square in shape, and was hovering above the treeline.  i noticed lights on the object, looked to have 3 red lights, and 1 white light. as i watched it, it was traveling southward, and then seemed to almost just vanish.  i could semi-clearly make out the object at first and within a minute it almost faded away.   it never seemed to land, and was definitely making distinct fast movements, when not hovering.  i personally do not follow or have a believe in ufo's, but i can not explain what i saw, and as i was watching, i had a certain fear that it would come towards me.  i am unaware of what the object was, but it has "shaken" me up, and made me re-think everything i believed in.....
content.summary: Ufo in a square shape, hovered then disappered.

content.detailedDescription: Large yellow disk came from space coming into my backyard and hovered then landed.  it picked me up with a purple laser beam and took me into their ship.  there was no military near by just other space ships.  they were about six foot tall and tan colored, they examined me as a doctor would a physical but could speak english and were very kind to me they showed me where they lived.  they told me they would be back soon but not a certain day.  they walked me back to my house and hovered then flew. away
content.summary: Large circular rotating disk with a yellowish glow and about 6 foot characters inside

content.detailedDescription: I was scared
content.summary: Wierd

content.detailedDescription:
We observed 3 discs in ocho rios, jamaica when we were on a cruise vacation  with royal caribbean's freedom of the seas cruise ship at 17:08 on 12/29/10.

i am attaching a picture i took from the cruise( freedom of the seas ) deck.
content.summary: 3 discs with yellow light

content.detailedDescription:
Seems like it was early fall. i do know that the approximate date was two weeks after "close encounters of the third kind" had come out in the theaters, because that was one of the things that victor had said to dan.
    i want to restate for the record... i don't know why this sighting hasn't been reported long before now. everybody in three counties saw the darn thing. and it was huge. ok, so here goes...
    the football game wasn't quite over. i still had my greyhounds marching band sweater on. i'm pretty sure i was supposed to walk home after the game was over. i ran into victor smit_ and dan souz_ in the parking lot out in the front of atascadero high school.
victor and dan had procured some weed and a case of budwiser and asked if i wanted to join them. they were headed out to a spot known as 3f meadows. one of their prefered party spots. but it seemed that victor had decided to show us a new spot off morro road, not that far from our original destination. the reason he liked this new party hole was because it was just that, a hole in the center of these large rocks that had been draged together i guess by the indians thousands of years ago.(a megalith)
there was plenty of room for maybe three or four cars to park. what made this spot exceptional was that the roof line of the car was just high enough that you could see the tops of cars approaching, but thier headlights were low enough that they didn't blind you. it was easy to tell if the approaching vehical had a cherry on top. and there were six or eight ways out of there. a pretty neat spot.
    we had just arrived, got out to strech our legs victor popped the trunk and we got four beers out, bud talls. we got back in the car listening to the radio as dan was rolling a joint in the shotgun seat. victor was just talking about how good it was that i had joined them that evening and commented on the stars and how bright they were in this secluded spot he had introduced us to, due to there not being any light pollution from town(atascadero,ca). he then became very excited. "dan look! it's just like in close encouters of the third kind". dan complained because victor had made him screw up on rolling the joint, broke the paper or spilt it or something. dan gave the lights in the sky an off-hand look and decided to get back to work trying to roll a joint. dan procceded to tell the tale of how he and victor had been to see the movie which had just opened two weeks before. he was telling us the tale of the movie when victor just about came unglued... "put that shit away and look at this. they're coming right to us. their coming right here". dan looked up and out the front windshield and was freaking out. i looked at the guy who was sitting beside me in the backseat and we both leaned over the back seat to get a better look at this thing. we could see it big as life. it was approaching us from the north, heading due south, right at us. it was moving slow and low over the foothills, just to the west of town. and it was headed straight out to where we were parked, in the midlle of this circle of rocks. as it got closer to us it slowed down even more. i remember this ancient oak tree that looked as if it had been hit by lighting once or twice in the past five hundred years, standing there under that flying sauser as though it had seen this craft before. victor said, "i'm going to get out and make contact", and immediatly both dan and i grabbed victor. i had wrapped my arm around him from behind and dan had his arm. i said "like hell, i'm not going to go home tonight and tell mother you were abducted by aliens". dan said, "ya right, you don't even know his parents. it would be me trying to explain this shit and i say we're all staying in the car no matter what happens".
    i want to call the other guy in the backseat with me jack or craig but i can't say for sure. well, he spoke up and suggested that we roll down our windows and sit in the windows so we could see it better. we all agreed. that sauser hung there just above that old oak like it had just been headed out to the woods and found us in its' parking space. then it began to just sort of moosy off toward pozo. 
    this is the point in my story where i want to describe the craft for you...  it was as big as a nfl regulation football held at arms length. approximately 200-300 yrds in diameter. it was hard to tell.
i don't remember there being a moon or not, or we would have been able to see the skin of the craft better. it was the classic shape of one dinner plate inverted on the other. there was no dome on top per-say, but there was a plasma like blue eletricity flowing from the top to the center and from the bottom to the centerline where the two plates would form the edge of the craft. just so you get the idea of how low to the ground this thing was...On the bottom of the craft there were two glowing orbs of energy, one greenish-white and the other redish-orange, but as it started to move away slowly, you could see a blueish orb on the far side, so as to make a group of three glowing orbs on the bottom of the craft. as it moved off it began to gain altitude, but not much. as it went out and around the foothills toward santa margarita,ca. it kind of gave a wagging off the wings. (i used to dream that i was on board and gave myself a dipping of the wings, so that i would remember that it was me flying by that night, saying goodbye to myself). the story doesn't end there.
    victor said "it's headed for black mountain". he fired up the car and we through out our beers that we had just opened and dan started cleaning up that joint he never finished rolling. we scramed to the 101 south bound. victor doing about a hundred miles per hour to margarita. as we screamed past the graveyard at hwy 58, i finaly talked victor into giving up the chase. i told him, "look, that thing could have sat down in any one of the valleys on either side these ridges and we would be driving right past them". we turned around at the 58 junction and headed home. i figure the only reason we weren't pulled over is because the cops were busy with the aliens. turns out that wasn't too far from the truth.
    victor dropped me off at 23:30. as i walked up the driveway to my house i decided that i had to wake up mom, dad, everybody and tell them what i had seen. if i waited till morning they would just blow me off as having gone out and partied too much the night before. i had to show them right now that i wasn't stoned or drunk or anything else by looking in my eyes tonight and seeing for themselves that my eyes were clear and that i was telling the truth. i had really seen a ufo. they're real!!!
    i got everybody up and gathered in the living room. i knelt down in front of my father sitting in his chair and looked him in the eyes and said glancing back and forth to mother, "tonight i saw a ufo, for real". my mother leaned over and sniffed me, "you've been drinking". "yes mother, i had maybe three swollows off a beer. don't you see? that's why i got you all up, so you can look in my eyes and know i'm telling you the truth". mom dismissed everyone while i knelt there at my father's knee and told him my story. "well", he said. "sounds like you had quite a night. let's go to bed. we'll talk about it in the morning".
    seems like the next morning was school. victor and dan amushed me at my locker, physcally threating me with kicking my ass if i told anyone about our ufo experiance. they knew it would take the two of them if they were to have have any chance of carring out thier threat. what really bothered me was how scared they were that i was going to say something. what was it that they were so afraid of? 
    that evening i was watching the evening news when there it was. ksby san luis obispo's television said that the sherif and police departments had responded to calls and witnessed the object cruising on by. i tried to get my mom into the living room to show her but it was too late.
    that weekend my uncle jerry and his brood (who lived in santa maria, ca)were over playing cards with mom and dad. when mom told uncle jerry, jerry called me into the dining room and asked me what i had seen. i told my story again. he said, "i saw it too". turns out he had been on the head end (he was an engineer for southern pacific rr) of a train pulled up to the gate at surf, ca.. for those who don't know, surf ca is the siding that trains have wait at before they can enter into vandenberg afb, the coastline. jr proceeded to tell of how he was just sitting there when our flying sauser came cruising over the coastal mountains at his back. he took notice when it dropped into his rearview mirror on the engine. it paralleled along about half of the trains length, slowly looking over the train. just then two jets scrambled off the runway headed in the wrong direction. when they started to come back around, my uncle jerry said "that sauser did a zig north and a zag west and that thing was gone like a bolt of lighting. those two planes didn't have a chance".
    it just so happened that my uncle jerry was actively pursuing his pilots' licence and knew just who to call at the santa maria airport tower. he asked if they had seen what he had just saw? his friend told him that the craft had cruised by slow and low that they thought it was going to hit the tower.
    a few days after the card game, jr calls me and tells me to go down to the store and get the telegram tribune and look on, it was either the forth or fifth page... and there it was. no bigger than a postage stamp, tucked in among the public service announcements... 
             "vandenberg afb reported tracking a ufo. contact was lost. an investigation is ongoing. there is nothing more to report at this time" (or something to that effect). i was 15 years old, a freshman.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The whole county saw it. why hasn't this one been covered?

content.detailedDescription: My significant other and i were sitting on the back porch, when an orange light caught my eye.  it was immediately unusual.  i live 20 miles south of an international airport, and 5 miles north of an air force base, and have grown up watching the skies.  this was completely silent, which was the first thing that struck me as odd.  i hear planes all the time.  this seemed so close, the light (singular) so much larger than normal that it should be emitting sound.  we walked out into the back lawn to get a better view.  the light was oval in shape and seemed to pulsate in waves, and almost spin, or maybe it was more like the light was showering down.  it moved at a constant speed, which seemed faster than the airplanes i see daily.  the size was larger than any airplane light i've witnessed (and the color all wrong), so i assumed the object was close, but perhaps it was larger and farther away.  we watched for maybe 30 seconds before it was no longer viewable.  planes seem to stay in view much longer than this object did.  it appeared from the north, and disappeared to the southwest, and quickly.  we sat back down and scratched our heads, and a couple of minutes later a second object appeared and followed what appeared to be the exact flight path, and had the identical features.  then it repeated a couple minutes later, for a total of 3 sightings within a period of no more than 5 minutes, all seemingly identical.  i have not seen anything like that before, or since.  it's quite possible it was some experimental aircraft, given my proximity to the air force base, but it was definitely unusual, and definitely something i'd never witnessed in my long lifetime.
content.summary: 3 sequential objects witnessed separately minutes apart.  no sound, large, orange pulsating lights.  seemed close, but absolutely no sound.  lights had oval shape.

content.detailedDescription: This was not a sighting but what was caught on a photo we took. we stopped to take two pictures of a spectacular sunset..Two days later the photos were uploaded and one the two photos was saved as a new wall paper for my  computer. i saw a spot on what i thought was the monitor thinking it was a speck of dust. with further zoom-ins it was clear that it wasn't a pixel problem or dust on the lens. the most puzzling of the two photos is of the black orb. the other figure is up and to the right of a bird in flight. both are puzzling and we would like a good explanation.
content.summary: Spherical object

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv when i notice reddish object over the air port area moving toward my apt very slowly i new what it was almost right away. i grab my camera whent out side and took photos of the object and was trying to switch to video when the object was no longer there,it just vanish one moment it was there and then gone.
i reviewed photo's and to my surprise there was other objects that i was not aware of and they seen to be some type of scouting craft of some sort,& they got closer then the object that i was trying to photograph did.
content.summary: First notice it over cival air-port but also near a.F.B may-be around 500 feet at first

content.detailedDescription: i was out riding bikes with may sister-inlaw and saw a big round red object with a tail, her son called he said he has been watching it for about five minutes, we saw it for about 2 minutes. have no idea what it was.
content.summary: It was like a big red ball with a tail, the way it was falling it looked like it might have gone in the ocean

content.detailedDescription: Went out in backyard to sat in lounge chair and watch the stars. looked up and saw large, large yellowish, white orb of light just sitting there. looked to be half the size of full moon. watched for a few seconds and it blinked off. in about 3 or 4 seconds it blinked on again.  it kept doing this for around a minute.All of a sudden, it shot straight up in the sky and headed toward columbia at a very high speed and was out of sight in what seemed like a second or two. i am a retired police officer and am still a constable in adair county, and i have no idea what this thing was.
content.summary: Large, bright orb,blinked on and off

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from work on highway 60 heading south when i saw the object out of the corner of my eye . i pulled off the side of the road at the intersection of highway 60 and fm521 and quickly took two pictures of it . then the object seemed to disappear . i looked at my phnes clock and it was exactly 7:39 pm i pulled back onto the road and continued down highway 60 looking around but not seeing anything . right when i reaced c.R.242 i spotted the object again but it disappeared before i could pull over . i proceeded home and when i got out of the car i searched the sky but i saw no trace of it . i have been trying to export the two photos from my phone to my e mail but it will not work for some reason . i will try to contact my carrier tomarrow and resolve this so i can post the photos for you to see .
content.summary: I saw it again and this time i got pictures

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening on aug 28th just after hurricane irene passed our area leaving our town in total blackout. the night sky as a result of all area lights being out and clear air after the storm allowed for very rare vivid visibilty of the stars. my son and i were looking at the stars when he brought to my attention almost straight up what looked like all the other starts except this one was moving across the sky, first thought it was a high flying jet or maybe we saw a satellight , space station or something like that. immediatly the light/ star began slowing down in rapid fashion, never saw an aircraft do this!  within a few ticks of the clock it came to a complete stop and  both my son and i realized jets, and satellights dont do that!  while both of us observed this now stationary light it just and abrubtly dissappeared, my son said he actually saw it zip off at great speed, to my eye it just gone in an instant.

very strange can not explain it, happened to fast to even consider a picture . did not expext this so no proof to offer . just sharing this experience as it is the strangest thing i have seen in the sky in my 57 years!
content.summary: What at first looke like star seen moving across sky , slowed down then stopped , stationary for about 2 - 4 sec before immediatly gone

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing like i always do, then the bright light appears out of no where. and moves in a steady forward motion for about on minute then disappears. it was not a plane, it wasnt flashing, it wasnt making a sound, it was just there, i stared at it the whole time. then it vanished. i havent seen it since.
content.summary: It shot across the sky, and i live close to an airport so i see plenty of planes, and i know for a fact, that this. was. not. a. plane

content.detailedDescription: It was orange/red pulsating small to big in shape,also was moved slow it seem  to look like it started to go up, and was gone.
content.summary: Ive had 2. 1 in the 60's and i seen something 2011 june

content.detailedDescription:
It was just about midnight and i was taking the pooches for a stroll when i saw a huge bright light dart about 40 degrees in a westward direction and remain there. continued the stroll checking periodically and it remained. put poochies to bed came back out with coffee and it was still there sort of pulsing and changing from really bright to slightly duller and back again. it appeared to be moving in a small erratic pattern while at its brightest. this continued for almost 2 hours it never moved. went in to refill coffee and pooooof it was gone no trace in sight. my daughter also witnessed this event.

the photos with "a" at the end have been enlarged the others are the originals.
content.summary: See photos attached

content.detailedDescription: At that time i worked grave yard. one night i got off early and went home like normal, grabed a cup of coffee and went out on the patio to relax,( i lived in a flight path of 1 public and several military airports.)knowing at this time of morning around 4am there is little to no planes in the sky.After 5 to 10 minutes to relax, unwind, enjoy the peace and quietness something caught my attention above my brow.Looking straight up,an object as out of the star war movies just kept coming and coming. it was night black,triangle in shape with rounded corners,and 1 large light directly in the center. the craft gave off no sound. as i watched the craft for about 3 min. flying due south toward the state capitol it seamed to be changing.Starting at the rear.It was as though you could see through it and even the stars above it.Looking closely you could make out rectagular shapes apearing in the craft. as the rectagular shapes kept appearing,the less you could make out. the out line and a narrow section from the front to the center of the craft is all you could make out. it was as though this craft went almost invisable. afterward i wrote down everything i could remember. as i was writing something came to mind. just a few years earlier i was on a military base where very few people get to go to this part of the base. in one of the offices i found something showing several different crafts in detail. one was the ----- estimated 2000 to 4000 mph + . one of the other ones resembles the one i saw, but not as large. estamated 6000 to 8000 mph +.                                                                                 i am a very open minded person, and i really don't think this craft was man made.  if it was,we had help.  ???
content.summary: A triangle shape craft with 1 light in the center,and went vertularly invisable as it flew over head.

content.detailedDescription:
it was in about 55 or 56. i was about 12 and ,i and a friend opened the door to my parents house and stepped onto the porch. he looked right and said" that car is haulin ass". i looked left and about 2 blocks away a "car " was tearing down the street. it was very bright ,with headlights approx. 1/2 the width of the vehicle ,and very bright.
  it was silent , perhaps humming, . when it got a bout 50 feet away, it went up in the air about 10 feet. then it quickly shot up at a steep angle and climbed into the sky. i walked out to the street and it climbed into the sky ,got smaller and smaller, and then was gone. 
   i ran to the front door to see if my parents saw anything. neither was in the living room. they were in the kitchen with no view. we ran to the street .Looking for someone to talk about the object to. there was no one there. the streets were empty. 
  that is when we both knew, we could not talk about it. no proof, and we would have been called idiots.
content.summary: Disc shaped object drove down the street like a car, then soared in front os an shot out into the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was stargazing alone on a hill when i heard a strange humming noise. i was surprised, and unsure of what to do. it was hard to describe how the ufo moved and what it did. i couldn't move or do anything, and i suddenly felt too tired to think. i feel asleep and woke up on the little hill i was on. they also stole all of my starwatching equiptment and my video camera. (i was recording what i saw for my science class.)
content.summary: A ufo landed when i was watching the stars.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: (ellisville southwest of st. louis,mo).(date 9-5-2011)while relaxing in the backyard on the deck laying in lawn chair with my grandaughter sitting next to me enjoying the nice afternoon and watching humming birds at the feeder and looking into the sky with a few clouds i noticed a flying craft with(brilliant silver cylnder shaped with small hump) no wings moving very very slow from the south east to norhtwest direction just barely above thin clouds.....My grand daughter saw it too...As it went over a small cloud and the cloud drifted it never appeared again....As we watched it was as if it disappeared into the blue sky.....Ha.She yelled for her dad to come out but he was to late and just dismissed the incident but did believe we saw something...From watching airplanes at that height in the past it was the size of a southwest airline plane..... about 5 minutes later the same place in the sky a huge crarft just appeared .....It was ten times larger than the smaller craft we observed earlier as it moved slowly from the northwest to the southeast for 2 minutes....Wonder how somthing thay big with no wings or tail can stay in the sky moving that slow(i must assume the don't need aerodynamics but use another source of power to move)....Then all of a sudden it just disappeared as if you would turn off a light..It was a brilliant sliver color....Having served in the military i've seen flying craft from the b-1,b2 and b52 bomber... been in fighter planes and touched,walked around and looked into the cockpit of the infamous supersonic  blackbird and have seen aircraft carriers...That was not swamp gas,optical illusion or a weather ballon,or any know craft i've ever observed.......It was as large as an aircraft carrier....Cylynder shaped,but had a slight hump on top --my grand daughter and i thought we were lucky to have witnessed the ufo event....She believes in them now....I always have since i saw one in 1957 as a teenager along with thousands of people across the city and as it went north of st.Louis in the early morning on a saturday or sunday when we were out on the school yard playing ball and it was silver and huge ,but never had mufon then.......The government stated the that it was mass halucination or possibly swamp gas (ha... no swamps north of st louis) well thats the end of my sighting...Keep your eyes open and please report what you see as thats the only way to understand what happening out there..Good luck.......
content.summary: Smaller craft flew into cloud but never came out as cloud drifted by as if it disappeared...Then suddenly the larger craft just appeared of no where and flew southeast from the northwest then it just dissappeared before my eyes and witness too

content.detailedDescription: Tonight my sister and i went out to just observe the sky.. in the area that she has been seeing alot of things when she is on breaks at work.. and within being there 45 mins.. at approximately 10:25pm this very bright object appears  below cloud cover.It was orange and it looked like the thing was on fire. so i continued to watch it and attempt to get video of it.. and i can say this thing reminded me alot of the sighting i had when  my boyfriend and daughter were outside fixing the pool.  but this thing was very intense just to see it and then try to follow it, we followed it for a good 10- 15 mins.. i think?  i dunno exactly..We were almost right up on this thing!!! my sister got really scared and wouldn't drive any closer to it.. as it just sorta looked like it was sitting there getting closer to us.. it was orange and it appeared to burn with intensity.. and i was like? we aren't looking at a lantern?  it was really exciting and i kept telling my sister to get closer get closer!! and she wouldn't! this thing changed directions on us a few times as we were following it.. and we did record it.. meanwhile my sister is out at the east end of logansport we are on the west side just out of city limits.  she calls us telling us she shes something in the west... and we tell her we are chasing it! so we keep following.. and then it gets dim a little and changes direction shortly after we stop the car to get another good look at it.. it dropped below the tree line and i could swear that it was landing!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Looked like a fireball hovering above cornfield

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were playing in our backyard i believe in 1968. we lived out of town bordering the woods in the town of north east md. it was summertime and still light, but soon to be dark. my brother and i were having a catch in the backyard. i was app. 8 or 9 years old at the time and my brother was app. 10 or 11 years old. my brother threw up the ball in the air and i went to catch it. i saw a bright, shiny aluminum type egg shaped object with the sun reflecting off of it fly over top of our two story farmhouse, my brother and myself and just over the tree line. it was broad day light. i asked my brother did you see that? he stated he did not see anything. it was egg shaped and just barely cleared the treeline about 40 ft. it was about 30 ft in size lengthwise and about half that width and had strange black writing on the bottom, which is the  angle i saw it from for the majority of the time. it looked liked some kind of foreign writing like russian or hieroglyphics which were in black. it moved very rapidly and the whole event took only a few seconds.It was moving so fast if you didn't happen to be looking up at the time you would have missed it. i attribute this due to the fact my brother did not see it and he was only about 20 ft away from me. it made no sound whatsoever. i was so scared i would not go outside at night for the rest of the summer. twenty five years later while working with someone who also lived in north east at the time and bringing up the subject, he stated that at about the same time he and his friends were playing basketball in town and saw the same object, during the summer and in broad daylight as well in that same time frame of 1968.
content.summary: In broad daylight saw 30 ft shiny egg shaped object fly over me at a very fast rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to go to sleep when i noticed 5 lights in the reflection of the t.V. through the window. i was curious because there was no noise. i looked out the window and saw an out line of a triangle outside the lights. when it dissapered behind the trees about 5 minutes later a black helicopter with no visible markings followed the same flight path with a searchlight at a fairly high speed.
content.summary: Boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
We are retired british nationals resident in malta (mediterraneamy) my wife and i were in the company of maltese friends on our home flat roof top, which overlooks coastal mellieha bay. 
i hasten to add we were not and had not been drinking alcohol, as open minded skeptics we do not follow ufo spotting as a hobby or interest. we had simply gone up to the roof garden to observe the coastline and townscape lights of mellieha bay... 
date was august 31st, 2011 and the time was approx 0200am. the weather conditions a warm 25 degrees (+/-) celcius & humidity 40% (+/-), there was a welcoming slight sea breeze and it was a clear cloudless star filled night sky. 
we each saw what at first seemed to be a conventional jet airliner on approach from a north west direction moving over mellieha bay and watched as it headed over our house to, we assumed, land at malta international airport. the 'aircraft' was moving noticably slower than a conventional jet airliner but we put this down to the fact it could be 'stacking'. very noticeably was it size, it was massive and easily four times the wing width of a conventional passenger airliner. we thought at first it was the new double deck a380 air bus coming in to land and we watched with added interest, but as it approached closer and above us was much bigger and had a non shiny opaque silvery look about it. there were no carrier company emblems to be seen. white/amber lights were set in pairs at the wing tips (one above the other) and these were quite bright. there was also a single white/amber light at the nose tip and smaller blue/greenish lights at each wing mid section. on the undercarriage a bright light pulsated between bright red and dull orange. the 'aircraft' as it passed above us banked from horizontal wing positon to nearly vertical and turned towards a south east direction, heading towards saint paul's bay area where it 'seemed' to stop for a short time before moving back out to sea (mediterranean) and disappearing from sight. 
the sighting from initial observation was approximately fifteen to twenty minutes. hard to be precise but wing tip to wing tip it was about 200 feet wide and 25 to 30 feet width at widest point. heighth (+/-) 1000 to 1500 feet up, maybe higher depending on the aircrafts size/dimensions... 
i'm not saying we saw a 'ufo' or anything unworldly, but it was definitely a weird aircraft, especially with its massive size, no recognisable jet engine noise and strangely arranged navigation lights.... 
however, on a lighter note...There is the possibly this strange 'aircraft' may have been an oversized illuminated chinese lantern or even a new type of weather balloon fuelled by marsh gas and piloted by a singing dancing monkey from nato on a reccy of mediterranean weather anomolies.. well, thats the sort of hog-wash explanation the so-called 'sensible' phd boffins would like us to believe !!???
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unconventional design large aircraft
